name: Golden House
description:
This is an awesome retro platformer style game with interesting gameplay, good controls and engrossing story. You have to jump and avoid obstacles.

Your sister needs your help! She's lost in a haunted house and you are the only one who can help her!

FEATURES
plenty of enemies and obstacles
pixel art and chiptune retro style game
6 chapters
48 hardcore levels
cool animated cutscenes before chapters
double/walk jumps

Story tells that the interior of the big house on the hill is made of gold. It belonged to some creepy guy called Mr. Gold that destroyed a lot of human beings to get rich. All his wealth was located in this house. After his death a lot of daredevils were trying to possess his richness but everyone who entered the Golden House stayed there forever. Legend says that Mr. Gold and all of his victims are haunting this place. No one will survive there! Unfortunately, your sister entered the Golden House. You have to save her before bloody deamons kill her and change her into one of them.
